column5: If I don't make it look for my name in the Spec's obits Monday. It is with great sadness that we inform the board of Old Ironmaker's presumed passing. While not yet confirmed, it is believed that he has now passed from this mortal coil into the ether of eternity. We will miss you as we now have no-one left to tease about not making dates.
So sad, he was sooooooo young.
man i red the title and was like "man i'm gonna miss that guy"   i almost had a heart ttack
Sad really, guess I'll have to close his account.

Lets teach him and not go to his funeral.   And we even had a nice cold glass of beer waiting for him and 2 lbs. of his favorite wings.  We couldn't see that go to waste, so I hope he forgives us for drinking his beer and eating his wings.  Kinda made me feel guilty
I can see the humour in this (if you followed the GTG thread)  id edit the title though for sure.  and im sure hes chillin with a beer watching the NFL right now!!!  ?
Funny he hasn't chimed in yet? lol.
"Lets teach him and not go to his funeral" I don't go to funerals because I know they aren't coming to mine
Lol..... I guess somebody thought my comment and condolences was serious too since it was deleted.... but you should have noted that I referred to Old Ironmaker as "Old Ironman" lol....  Burt
I appreciated the advice he gave me on my upcoming trip to Nipissing next month.  RIP

It was close. the Dr's didn't think I would make it through the night. Bottom line is the boys and I celebrated a bit yesterday afternoon and I won't drink and die. When they dropped me off my wife said " you are not going anywhere!" Smart lady she is.  I guess I'm going to miss my own funeral, again, but thanks for the condolences regardless. Please send money.  Sounds like you all had a good time even without the free entertainment.
good to hear your still alive!  or are you??
I am but the Bills aren't.
my Colts are good but boy did they take a whoopin today haha
